name: Big-Batch Grilled Montreal Chicken Breasts
description: Cook once, eat twice! Grilled Chicken tonight, Cobb Salad tomorrow.

ingredients.name: Montreal Steak Rub or Beef & Steak Seasoning

preparation: Rub chicken with oil. Liberally shake Montreal Steak Rub on both sides.
Grill for 4–5 minutes per side, or until an instant-read thermometer indicates a Food Safe internal temperature of 165° F (74° C).

No barbecue? No problem! Lightly oil fry pan with a basting brush and cook chicken over medium-low heat for approximately 5 minutes. Turn over, and place in a pre-heated 350° F (175° C) oven and cook another 10–15 minutes, until chicken is cooked through.
tips: Serving Suggestion: Serve garnished with fresh lemon slices alongside a luscious summer salad and grilled vegetables, or serve on a crusty bun for a delicious chicken burger.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with a bun and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure dressing.
